Sentencas: Highly porous Pt thin films, with nano-scale porosity, were fabricated by reactive sputtering.

Sentencas: The strategy involved deposition of thin film PtOx at room temperature, followed by the subsequent decomposition of the oxide by rapid heat treatment.
Titulo: Investigation of nanoporous platinum thin films fabricated by reactive sputtering: Application as micro-SOFC electrode

Sentencas: The resulting films exhibited percolating Pt networks infiltrated with interconnected nanosized pores, critical for superior solid oxide fuel cell cathode performance.

Sentencas: This approach is particularly attractive for micro-fabricated solid oxide fuel cells, since it enables fabrication of the entire cell stack.

Sentencas: In this work, the morphological, crystallographic and chemical properties of the porous electrode were systematically varied by control of deposition conditions.

Sentencas: Oxygen reduction reaction kinetics were investigated by means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, demonstrating the critical role of nano-pores in achieving satisfactory micro-SOFC cathode performance.
